channel.title: TuT: "IF Satements" (small explanation)
channel.description:
[center][b] I KNOW THIS HAS PRETTY MUCH NOTHING TO DO WITH SERVERS, BUT CAN BE CONVERTED [/b]
For the people messaging me on msn, it isn't really hard at all
Example of an IF Statement(the example is done for main class, but it can be any):
[code] import java.util.Scanner; // The import for the scanner, so that you can use keyboard.
class whateveryourclassisnamed { // name, just depending on the name of the class you wish to add this to. public static void main(String args[]){ // This is just an example for this being done in the main. int poosmells = 10; // variable, saying poosmells = 10 aka bad.(just for the explanation)
if (poosmells == 0) { // if the poo smells nice(0), it will print the line into your cmd saying: yes. System.out.println("the poo smells nice!"); // print line yes. }else{ // otherwise System.out.println("the poo smells bad!"); // if the poo smells bad, it will say this. } } } [/code]
I hope this helped couple of my friends from msn, and anyone that may have needed this.[/center]

item.title: TuT: "IF Satements" (small explanation)
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[center] I KNOW THIS HAS PRETTY MUCH NOTHING TO DO WITH SERVERS, BUT CAN BE CONVERTED

For the people messaging me on msn, it isn’t really hard at all

Example of an IF Statement(the example is done for main class, but it can be any):

import java.util.Scanner; // The import for the scanner, so that you can use keyboard.

class whateveryourclassisnamed { // name, just depending on the name of the class you wish to add this to.
	public static void main(String args[]){ // This is just an example for this being done in the main.
		int poosmells = 10; // variable, saying poosmells = 10 aka bad.(just for the explanation)
		
		
		if (poosmells == 0) { // if the poo smells nice(0), it will print the line into your cmd saying: yes.
		System.out.println("the poo smells nice!"); // print line yes.
	}else{ // otherwise
		System.out.println("the poo smells bad!"); // if the poo smells bad, it will say this.
	}
	}
}

I hope this helped couple of my friends from msn, and anyone that may have needed this.[/center]

Read full topic
